entries.generator_activate: You switch the generator on. The bunker returns to full power.
entries.generator_deactivate: You turn the generator off. The bunker is now on emergency power only.
entries.computer_desktop_denied: A small but powerful force field prevents you from interacting with the desktop computer.
entries.computer_desktop_activate: You activate the desktop computer: Remote Host -- Transmitting Security Codes...
entries.security_no_power: There is no power being supplied to this terminal.
entries.security_override: Warning: Security Override engaged, please use caution.
entries.security_access_denied: Error: Remote host must be activated before security override can be engaged.
entries.computer_desktop_deactivate: You turn off the desktop computer: Remote Host -- Disconnecting...
entries.computer_mainframe_no_power: There is no power being supplied to the mainframe computer.
entries.computer_mainframe_success: Making an educated guess, you manage to find the command to open all doors in the bunker. Congratulations!
entries.computer_mainframe_already: All the doors are already open in this facility.
entries.computer_mainframe_failure: You make an educated guess but fail to unlock the doors. Your tampering alerted the attention of several guards.
entries.computer_mainframe_denied: Error: You must engage security override before accessing facility system settings.
entries.computer_mainframe_text: The bunker's mainframe computer stands before you. You're not certain exactly how it works.  Would you like to make an educated guess and attempt to unlock all the doors in the facility?
entries.computer_mainframe_info: Someone with an advanced education or technical knowledge should be able to figure this out.
entries.computer_mainframe_yes: You attempt to unlock the facility doors...
entries.explosion_warning: The bunker is exploding! You need to exit immediately or you will be killed!
entries.bunker_exploding: The bunker is exploding around you! You need to evacuate immediately!
entries.destruct_engaged: Self destruct sequence activated. Have a nice day!
entries.keypad_open: You now have clearance to enter the room.
